Notable Characters

View all ‚Üí
Character Rank #0

Fluffy

Unknown

The most powerful entity in Criozevan. Power Rank #0. A Meta ‚Äî the only category above the five power classes. Nothing confirmed about appearance, motivation, or current location.

View Profile
Character Rank #1

Vorvax

Unknown (Divine-class Entity)

Power Rank #1. Divine-class entity. Responsible for the War of Fodon ‚Äî its influence drove X'zel from Criozevan and destroyed the Tharnex. Currently unlocated. Only Fluffy is ranked above it.

View Profile
Character Rank #2

Crimson Knight

Folkwynd (Human)

Power Rank #2. Folkwynd human. Leader of the Crimson Rooks. Governs Vacron from shadow. Has met Fluffy and survived. The most politically powerful individual in surface Criozevan.

View Profile
Character Rank #4

Golem King

Golem

Power Rank #4. Creator of the Golem race. Ruler of the Nikolem Kingdom. The oldest confirmed living entity in Criozevan. His Realm Expansion converts a battlefield to pure stone terrain.

View Profile
Character Rank #5

Selvarin

Folkwynd (Human)

Power Rank #5. Master of Swords. Oredsy's sword-philosophy leader. Carries Vaelrin's Edge. Has never lost a recorded duel. His doors are unlocked.

View Profile
Character Rank #5

Sunlee

Folkwynd (Human)

Power Rank #5. Master of Martial Arts. Ruler of Akison's Iron Path government. The Black Root Staff grows stronger every time it is struck. Has never lost a fight recorded in Akison's history.

View Profile
